ygData.subject: Re: New Tinkerable item, scuba gear ?
ygData.msgSnippet: You also need to realize that Fishbone Earrings are very limited, Even with Kedge Keep being Itemized, and people camp the mob that drops it, it is still going
ygData.messageBody:
You also need to realize that Fishbone Earrings are very limited, Even with
Kedge Keep being Itemized, and people camp the mob that drops it, it is
still going to be limited. I already have a slew of high levels waiting for
scuba gear. And they are willing to pay quite a bit for it. So don't think
we are out of the race yet. If you were a high lvl sitting in the camp line
for Fishbone Earrings, and you saw a gnome sitting there saying, selling
Scuba Gear. Which would you choose? hehe..thought so..;-)

Shokakon

>Anyway I REALLY hate to burst anyones bubble too much but there is a higher
>lvl item that gives unlimited underwater breathing, yes the fish bone
>earing.
> Until verrant makes us a commodity like rogues Make poison, enchanter's
>Enchant " place your metal here" wizards " I can kill anything faster than
>you AND translocate to a different plane". I realize that some of what I
>said are not skills, they are class specific, but I believe you get the
>point.
